channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Family of U.S. student missing in the Dominican Republic believes she drowned
item.description: Sudiksha Konanki remains missing after she disappeared during a spring break trip with friends.

item.title: Istanbul mayor and Erdogan rival arrested in major crackdown
item.description: Ekrem Imamoglu's detention comes days before he was due to be selected as a presidential candidate.

item.title: US immigration flights set off terrified international searches for missing loved ones

item.title: Russia and Ukraine carry out attacks after Putin-Trump call
item.description: The attacks came hours after Vladimir Putin said Russia would stop targeting Ukrainian energy sites.

item.title: How astronauts adjust when back on Earth after being in space
item.description: Astronauts face several risks during spaceflight, including exposure to radiation.

item.title: Switching from gas to electric? Here's 3 appliances that are easy to install

item.title: DR Congo and Rwanda call for ceasefire in conflict with M23 rebels
item.description: The meeting comes amid an M23 advance that has seen the rebels seize two cities in eastern DR Congo.

item.description: NASA astronauts return to Earth after nine months in space; 100 years since deadliest tornado in U.S. history

item.title: Putin agrees in Trump call to pause Ukraine energy attacks but no full ceasefire
item.description: The Russian leader declines to sign up to a plan that Ukraine had accepted for a month-long ceasefire.

item.title: Israel launches fresh Gaza strikes as it vows to resume fighting 'in full force'
item.description: The bombing is not of the same scale as it was on Tuesday, but it shows no let-up in Israel's fresh assault.
